briefTitle: Stereotactic Radiology Versus Chemotherapy for Recurrent/Progressive Glioblastoma After Second-Line Chemotherapy

interventions.name: Chemotherapy
otherNames: Either irinotecan or temozolomide or carboplatin or etoposide

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Histologically proven intracranial glioblastoma multiforme with pathologic or imaging confirmation of tumor progression or regrowth after failure of two previous treatment regimens
* Initial low-grade glioma and a subsequent diagnosis of glioblastoma or gliosarcoma
* History and physical exam, including neurologic examination, within 4 weeks prior to registration

Exclusion Criteria:

â€¢ Warfarin or LMW heparin patients must have no active bleeding or pathological condition that carries a high risk of bleeding
